The Website of Resurgence - SMVDU, to be held in April, 2015.
Resurgence, the Annual Cultural and Sports festival of Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU) , is one of the most popular college fest in the northern India. It is one of the largest platforms for college students across the country to come together to celebrate culture, fine arts and social awareness.
resurgence.smvdu.net.in

Languages/Script :
HTML, Javascript, CSS, PHP , Ajax
FrameWork :
AngularJS, BootStrap, jQuery
Github Link :
github.com/smvdu/Resurgence-website
